subject: fix: use relative paths in PWA manifest for GitHub Pages
body:
The manifest used absolute paths (scope: "/", start_url: "/") which
pointed to the root of github.io instead of the /repo-tor/ subdirectory.
Changed to relative paths ("./", "./index.html") for proper PWA installation.

Also updated service worker precache paths and bumped cache version.

https://claude.ai/code/session_019STw2NTQcvUZCfNv3kycME
title: use relative paths in PWA manifest for GitHub Pages
